{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Executive",
  "description": "At DuoTech HR Consulting, we understand that the success of any organization lies in its people. We are a leading HR Tech company dedicated to empowering businesses with innovative solutions and cutting-edge technology to transform their human resources practices.

With years of expertise in the HR industry, we have a deep understanding of the challenges faced by businesses today. We believe that every company, regardless of its size or industry, deserves access to top-tier HR solutions that drive growth, improve employee engagement, and maximize productivity.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Wuse, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	This role is designed for a dynamic and persuasive professional with deep knowledge of the Abuja property market.
	As the Business Development Executive, you&rsquo;ll be responsible for sourcing new clients, pitching property solutions, and closing high-value deals.
	You&rsquo;ll also manage relationships and contribute to strategic growth in property sales and management.


Ideal for:


	Real estate agents
	Sales professionals with property experience
	Business developers with strong pitching skills
	Anyone with a proven ability to convert leads into revenue.


Key Responsibilities


	Source and close property sales and lease deals
	Pitch real estate solutions to individual and corporate clients
	Conduct market research and identify new business opportunities
	Manage client relationships and maintain a strong referral network
	Coordinate property listings, inspections, and documentation
	Collaborate with marketing team to promote listings and campaigns
	Prepare proposals and presentations for investors and buyers
	Track sales performance and report to management.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business, Marketing, Estate Management, or related field
	Minimum 3 years of experience in property sales or business development
	Proven track record of closing high-value deals
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills
	Strong understanding of Abuja&rsquo;s real estate market
	Ability to work with targets and commission structures
	Professional certification in real estate is an added advantage.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;hello@duotechhr.com.ng&nbsp;and CC&nbsp;duotechhr@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Application for [Business Developer &ndash; Real Estate]&quot; as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-15",
  "validThrough": "2025-09-23",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "DuoTech HR Consulting"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Abuja",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "187341"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 150000,
      "maxValue": 250000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Business Development Executive Job at DuoTech HR Consulting




        
    

        
        At DuoTech HR Consulting, we understand that the success of any organization lies in its people. We are a leading HR Tech company dedicated to empowering businesses with innovative solutions and cutting-edge technology to transform their human resources practices.

With years of expertise in the HR industry, we have a deep understanding of the challenges faced by businesses today. We believe that every company, regardless of its size or industry, deserves access to top-tier HR solutions that drive growth, improve employee engagement, and maximize productivity.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive
     

            
    



Job Location: Wuse, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	This role is designed for a dynamic and persuasive professional with deep knowledge of the Abuja property market.
	As the Business Development Executive, you’ll be responsible for sourcing new clients, pitching property solutions, and closing high-value deals.
	You’ll also manage relationships and contribute to strategic growth in property sales and management.


Ideal for:


	Real estate agents
	Sales professionals with property experience
	Business developers with strong pitching skills
	Anyone with a proven ability to convert leads into revenue.


Key Responsibilities


	Source and close property sales and lease deals
	Pitch real estate solutions to individual and corporate clients
	Conduct market research and identify new business opportunities
	Manage client relationships and maintain a strong referral network
	Coordinate property listings, inspections, and documentation
	Collaborate with marketing team to promote listings and campaigns
	Prepare proposals and presentations for investors and buyers
	Track sales performance and report to management.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Estate Management, or related field
	Minimum 3 years of experience in property sales or business development
	Proven track record of closing high-value deals
	Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills
	Strong understanding of Abuja’s real estate market
	Ability to work with targets and commission structures
	Professional certification in real estate is an added advantage.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: hello@duotechhr.com.ng and CC duotechhr@gmail.com using "Application for [Business Developer – Real Estate]" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Marketer",
  "description": "DuoTech HR Consulting -&nbsp;Our client, a fast-growing company in the real estate sector, with operations in Abuja and surrounding regions, is&nbsp;recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer

Job Location:&nbsp;Wuse, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are seeking to hire a creative and performance-driven Digital Marketer to manage and grow the client&rsquo;s online presence.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing digital campaigns, managing social media, and driving lead generation through strategic content and advertising.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute digital marketing strategies across social media, email, and web platforms
	Manage paid advertising campaigns (Google Ads, Meta Ads)
	Create engaging content for blogs, newsletters, and social media
	Monitor analytics and prepare performance reports
	Optimize SEO and SEM efforts to improve visibility
	Collaborate with design and content teams to align messaging
	Stay updated on digital trends and recommend innovations.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
	2 - 3 years of experience in digital marketing
	Proficiency in Meta Business Suite, Google Analytics, Canva, Mailchimp
	Strong writing and content creation skills
	Experience with CRM platforms and marketing automation is a plus.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;hello@duotechhr.com.ng&nbsp;and CC&nbsp;duotechhr@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Application for Digital Marketer&quot; as the subject of the mail.",

Digital Marketer Job at DuoTech HR Consulting




        
    

        
        DuoTech HR Consulting - Our client, a fast-growing company in the real estate sector, with operations in Abuja and surrounding regions, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer

Job Location: Wuse, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking to hire a creative and performance-driven Digital Marketer to manage and grow the client’s online presence.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing digital campaigns, managing social media, and driving lead generation through strategic content and advertising.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute digital marketing strategies across social media, email, and web platforms
	Manage paid advertising campaigns (Google Ads, Meta Ads)
	Create engaging content for blogs, newsletters, and social media
	Monitor analytics and prepare performance reports
	Optimize SEO and SEM efforts to improve visibility
	Collaborate with design and content teams to align messaging
	Stay updated on digital trends and recommend innovations.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field
	2 - 3 years of experience in digital marketing
	Proficiency in Meta Business Suite, Google Analytics, Canva, Mailchimp
	Strong writing and content creation skills
	Experience with CRM platforms and marketing automation is a plus.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: hello@duotechhr.com.ng and CC duotechhr@gmail.com using "Application for Digital Marketer" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
